# Loading Data 
```{r load}
load("BostonData.Rdat")
```

# Plot Data 
```{r plot}

plot(boston)
```

It looks like the variables distance.to.work and NO.concentration are tightly related 

# Fitting Linear Regression
```{r Linear1}
mod1 <- lm(home.value ~ NO.concentration, data = boston)
summary(mod1)
```

```{r Linear2}
mod2 <- lm(home.value ~ distance.to.work, data = boston)
summary(mod2)
```
```{r Linear3}
mod3 <- lm(home.value ~ student.teacher.ratio, data = boston)
summary(mod3)
```
